availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, grocery merchant. Native of Ireland. Grocery merchant in Louisville, Kentucky, in 1850. Owned one enslaved person in Louisville in 1850. Grocery merchant in Louisville in 1858. Grocery merchant in Louisville in 1860. Owned two enslaved persons in Louisville in 1860. Grocery merchant in Louisville in 1861. Member of the Board of Directors of the Franklin Insurance Company in Louisville in 1862 through 1865. Grocery merchant in Louisville in 1864. Grocery merchant in Louisville in 1865.
